name: n8n-nodes-base.splitOut
semantic_context: Turn a list inside item(s) into separate items

fieldToSplitOut.name: fieldToSplitOut
fieldToSplitOut.placeholder: Drag fields from the left or type their names
fieldToSplitOut.description: The name of the input fields to break out into separate items. Separate multiple field names by commas. For binary data, use $binary.
fieldToSplitOut.hint: Use $binary to split out the input item by binary data
fieldToSplitOut.ai_hint: The name of the input fields to break out into separate items. Separate multiple field names by commas. For binary data, use $binary.

include.name: include
include.description: Whether to copy any other fields into the new items
include.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

fieldsToInclude.name: fieldsToInclude
fieldsToInclude.description: Fields in the input items to aggregate together
fieldsToInclude.ai_hint: Fields in the input items to aggregate together

options.name: options
disableDotNotation
options.description: Whether to disallow referencing child fields using `parent.child` in the field name

options.name: destinationFieldName
options.description: The field in the output under which to put the split field contents

options.name: includeBinary
options.description: Whether to include the binary data in the new items

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。
